sentences.sContent: Students from a privileged background have an advantage at university.
sentences.sCn: 出身于特权阶层的学生在大学里具有优势。

sentences.sContent: Only the privileged few can afford private education.
sentences.sCn: 只有享有特权的少数人才能上得起私立学校。

remMethod.val: priv(单个) ＋ i ＋ leg(法律) ＋ e → 法律上的独享权利 → 特权

trans.tranOther: having advantages because of your wealth, social position etc
